summary: Adds some chainmail to the heavy variants.
descriptionHtml:
Both Dawnguard heavy armor variants now have a hauberk added to make them differ visually even more compared to the light variants.
Dawnguard DLC is required.


Credits & thanks
Bethesda Softworks
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1067773/?]nouserhere[/url], chain texture adapted from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44167/?]his excellent mod[/url].


---------------
Installation
---------------
Dawnguard required.
Place the 'Meshes' and 'Textures' folders inside the game's DATA folder.
Place the .ESP file inside the DATA folder and then enable the mod in the launcher or use a mod manager.
author: defunkt
